const exceptions = {
	'M.2.0.1': '85e88a8d-16d6-43ae-b4f9-7fbf6f0e5bbc',
	'M.3.1.1': 'fa026383-afa9-4e26-af54-cd665923b898',

	'valor': '5279dae6-3149-46b7-8416-6d6c113b53d6',
	'numeroSerie': 'c3aa58c4-49f0-4be0-83df-858a6bfab4a2',
	'listaNumerica': 'e483f4b7-d6a6-40fa-8844-da00fa4d61c3',
	'MS.7.2.1': '1259c61d-39dd-4690-845a-4690ed43fd89',
	'hora': '8493ef86-e2fd-4f7a-a3a6-22e8b692fde5',
	'MS.7.2.0': 'fd0f98d7-8b05-47cb-b71d-4cb355b62ac1',
	'cnpj': 'ccdbde85-fde9-4435-a4c0-d3382f10eb71',
	'dynamicContent': '196b946e-7bf0-4c37-84be-3bddb2e16ef9',
}

const exceptionPersistente = {
	'M.2.0.1': '7f9b2e8c-5ff5-4647-a236-3d073a317e34',
	'M.3.1.1': 'fa026383-afa9-4e26-af54-cd665923b898',
	'M.4.1.1': '10e3ef0f-0283-464c-a28e-6b4ddc4faa47',
	'MS.2.1.1': 'b1273c23-bade-4c80-9b83-73d71e70a145',
	'protocolo': '22309784-7b14-49d7-82da-cea3d27821c7',
	'MS.4.0.0': '14c52081-5af8-482d-977e-37adf45ebdc2',
	'MS.4.1.0': '8bc01a45-d42c-4a37-8ca3-a44267903349',
	'lista': '1f6ee37b-e2ae-41de-b0db-beb7e1023a1f',
	'quickReply': '6c0b59fa-008b-49a1-890b-43ceb9376ffa',
	'erroGenerico': 'b06fbe89-30e8-47ae-ac8b-4d8c77aa62cc',
	'ofensa': '120ac73a-eb29-4f62-81fe-df8ed2bfc41e',
	'kba': '23236f57-7240-458d-ad71-275b5d3199bd',
	'data': 'bee7de5f-6f29-4529-b826-e8568fce9300',
	'valor': '2a2716cb-ce17-4d55-ae38-c7bdecfcdfa4',
	'numeroSerie': '44c9519a-343d-45ba-b950-61940ea128ab',
	'listaNumerica': 'e483f4b7-d6a6-40fa-8844-da00fa4d61c3',
	'MS.7.2.1': '1259c61d-39dd-4690-845a-4690ed43fd89',
	'hora': '8493ef86-e2fd-4f7a-a3a6-22e8b692fde5',
	'MS.7.2.0': 'fd0f98d7-8b05-47cb-b71d-4cb355b62ac1',
	'cnpj': 'de1b3cf5-3177-49e4-91f0-0ad016e3a6c9',
	'dynamicContent': '196b946e-7bf0-4c37-84be-3bddb2e16ef9'
}

const exceptionFinalizacao = {
	'M.2.0.1': '220e2439-9123-414b-89d7-6d511707d27f',
	'M.3.1.1': 'f56b801b-39fe-4428-96c7-28d2d57d2190',
	'M.4.1.1': '27f2cef0-593c-4755-99ec-88d82ceb38de',
	'kba': '81c51d0d-d62e-458e-b2da-5650cbed64ab',
	'MS.4.0.0': 'c761d4b7-c871-4939-bb0d-ac6d47bd0c92',
	'MS.2.1.1': 'bf05ff39-9867-45cd-aba0-12ac8b53e6c4',
	'protocolo': '8a22702f-61ed-4cec-bb66-c51f158c4cca',
	'data': '979b5402-311d-443b-80f7-1f68288b97b2',
	'valor': 'e7e5923a-5c40-469c-92b0-8977cecb7ae4',
	'MS.4.1.0': '2708d5d2-79bd-4096-a5bf-cf03ad6854a5'
}
function run(errorCounter, exceptionType, state) {
	try {
		let { counter } = JSON.parse(errorCounter)
		const { stateNameOrigin } = JSON.parse(state)
		if (counter == 1) {
			if (exceptionType) {
				return exceptions[exceptionType] || 'b06fbe89-30e8-47ae-ac8b-4d8c77aa62cc'
			}
			return exceptions[stateNameOrigin] || 'b06fbe89-30e8-47ae-ac8b-4d8c77aa62cc'
		}
		if (counter == 2) {
			if (exceptionType) {
				return exceptionPersistente[exceptionType] || 'bf9f953c-4333-49f5-96aa-5b150b61e472'
			}
			return exceptionPersistente[stateNameOrigin] || 'bf9f953c-4333-49f5-96aa-5b150b61e472'
		}
		return exceptionFinalizacao[exceptionType] || '65f78315-dd8c-4180-a767-a75d57606ba4'
	}
	catch (err) {
		return '2e195653-b9a0-4a52-a437-445882902635';
	}
}

settings.content:
*Não localizamos o CNPJ digitado.*
Para prosseguirmos, é necessário que você informe o número do seu CNPJ com 14 dígitos, inclusive com os zeros iniciais da esquerda se tiver.
*Por exemplo, 01.234.567/0001-23.*

document.content:

Para prosseguirmos, é necessário que você informe o número do seu CNPJ com 14 dígitos, inclusive com os zeros iniciais da esquerda se tiver.
*Por exemplo, 01.234.567/0001-23.*
